title: Blended EAP Program for Enhancing Collaborative Academic Writing Competency

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic academic writing structures and proficiency in elementary-level mathematical terminology
context.additional_context: Learners composed of current practitioners perform collaborative writing and feedback processes using smartphones as the primary tool. Due to limited technological environments, utilizing mobile-optimized tools is essential

learning_goals: Learners can improve academic writing drafts by 30% or more based on peer review feedback received at least three times over four weeks.
Learners can interpret feedback from AWE (Automated Writing Evaluation) tools and propose at least two revisions within a collaborative group.
Learners can conduct real-time collaborative writing with group members at least once a week using Google Docs or mobile-optimized collaboration tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
